description: This course examines Christian ethics along with major frameworks in philosophical ethics (Utilitarianism, Liberalism, and Marxism) in addressing economic issues. Offered most years. Prerequisites: one of Economics 110-121 and completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.
name: Economic Justice
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.
Open only to seniors and juniors during web registration.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: one of Economics 110-121 and completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.
